data.content: Converted Take\! poll loop to use kno poll --claim instead of kno claim <id>. Added pollKnot() to knots.ts, buildPollPrompt() to BackendPort interface, implemented in all backends (knots returns poll result, others return UNAVAILABLE). Updated terminal-manager buildNextPollPrompt() to use the new method. The poll loop still checks the original beat's state for stop conditions (terminal/human-owned) but now claims the highest-priority work via kno poll --claim. Added 3 tests for buildTakePrompt and buildPollPrompt. All 801 tests pass. Commit: 78972c6
